messages.title: General Election 2015 (GE2015)
messages.content: Dear Resident, The Conservatives came second in GE2010. We will never deliver Conservative change with the Liberals producing ties in a two-horse race; a tactic they deploy in many seats even in North boroughs (as in Lewisham). Without a considered and careful consideration your vote could result in voting in a Trojan horse candidate.

messages.title: A Vision for Cambridge
messages.content: I have disclosed Cambridge a genuine three-horse race for 2015. Since August 2014, my team and I have been campaigning fulltime and championing a constructive Cambridge: a Cambridge that is empowering and rewarding yet a more affordable locality; a vision that is uplifting and recovery for the future prosperity of our city.

messages.title: It's On!
messages.content: Our analysis reveals a 1,168 Conservative households voted Liberal last time due to tact. Look at how well we have done and in some instances we have found upwards of 9 households voted in fear of Labour. Voting Irwin will not deliver a Parliament. Every vote counts in Cambridge.

messages.title: Join Our Movement
messages.content: Vote FERNANDO ON THURSDAY 7th MAY, 2015 TO TURN CAMBRIDGE BLUE. Let's Win Cambridge Back For The Conservatives.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives came second in GE2010. Without a considered and careful consideration your vote could result in voting in a Trojan horse candidate. Our analysis reveals a 1,168 Conservative households voted Liberal last time due to tact.
